Tags
====

This module allows you to create, view, and delete tags.

Tag Information
''''''''''''''''

.. list-table:: 
  :widths: 25 10 10 30
  :header-rows: 1

  * - Attribute
    - Type
    - Required
    - Description
  * - ``tag``
    - ``str``
    - Yes
    - The name of the tag.
  * - ``user_id``
    - ``int``
    - Yes
    - The id of the currently logged in user is automatically assigned to the tag.


HTTP Endpoints
''''''''''''''

.. http:get:: /tags/

  Allows you to view all tags.

  **Example request**:

    .. sourcecode:: http

        GET /tags
        Host: example.com
        Accept: application/json
        x-access-token: eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJ1c2VybmFtZSI6ImphbmVkb2U0NCIsImV4cCI6MTc0NDYyOTM3OX0.43dgIGUbKHtbDs5XqzCl_MFsKFgMyFo_SyKY1sLmCu4
        

  **Example response**:

    .. sourcecode:: http
                
        {
      "tags": [
          "men",
          "women",
          "red",
          "white",
          "logo",
          "printed",
          "cotton",
          "polyester",
          "shortsleeve", 
          ]
        }


.. http:post:: /tags/<tag>

  Allows you to add a new tag.

  .. list-table:: Parameters
    :widths: 25 10 10 30
    :header-rows: 1

    * - Attribute
      - Type
      - Required
      - Description
    * - ``tag``
      - ``str``
      - Yes
      - The name of the tag you'd like to add.

  .. warning::
    This endpoint requires authentification token provided in the ``Authorization`` header.
  
  .. attention::

    This endpoint requires admin status.

  .. attention::  
    The request is successful only when the ``tag`` is assigned to your ``user_id``.

  .. admonition:: Status Codes

    This endpoint can return ``401`` status code.


  **Example request**:

    .. sourcecode:: http

        POST /tags/silk
        Host: example.com
        Accept: application/json
        x-access-token: eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJ1c2VybmFtZSI6ImphbmVkb2U0NCIsImV4cCI6MTc0NDYyOTM3OX0.43dgIGUbKHtbDs5XqzCl_MFsKFgMyFo_SyKY1sLmCu4
        

  **Example response**:

    .. sourcecode:: http
          
          {
        "message": "Tag added!"
          }
          

.. http:delete:: /tags/<tag>

  Allows you to remove a tag.

  .. list-table:: Parameters
    :widths: 25 10 10 30
    :header-rows: 1

    * - Attribute
      - Type
      - Required
      - Description
    * - ``tag``
      - ``str``
      - Yes
      - The name of the tag you'd like to add.

  .. warning::
    This endpoint requires authentification token provided in the ``Authorization`` header.

  .. attention::

    This endpoint requires admin status.

  .. attention::  
    The request is successful only when the ``tag`` is assigned to your ``user_id``.

  .. admonition:: Status Codes

    This endpoint can return ``401`` or ``404`` status code.


  **Example request**:

    .. sourcecode:: http

        DELETE /tags/silk
        Host: example.com
        Accept: application/json
        x-access-token: eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJ1c2VybmFtZSI6ImphbmVkb2U0NCIsImV4cCI6MTc0NDYyOTM3OX0.43dgIGUbKHtbDs5XqzCl_MFsKFgMyFo_SyKY1sLmCu4
        

  **Example response**:

    .. sourcecode:: http
        
        {
      "message": "Tag removed!"
        }
